entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
